snippet: A video message from Malala Yousafzai's father, Ziauddin, released by the hospital in Birmingham, England, where she is recovering, includes footage of the young activist.
abstract: A video message from Malala Yousafzai's father, Ziauddin, released by the hospital in Birmingham, England, where she is recovering, includes footage of the young activist.

headline.main: Pakistani Girl's Father Thanks Supporters From Her Hospital Room
